channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [DERBY-6104] Tasks for producing a 10.10.1 feature release.
item.summary: Tasks for producing a 10.10.1 feature release.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Attaching derby-6104-01-aa-errorCodeTables.diff. This patch checks in a new version of the error code tables so that tonight's alpha docs can be used to vet user guides for the 10.10.1 release. Committed at subversion revision 1455242.

Touches the following file:

M src/ref/rrefexcept71493.dita

Attaching derby-6104-02-aa-releaseNotesFirstRev.diff. This patch checks in the first rev of the 10.10.1 release notes. Committed at subversion revision 1455291.

Touches the following files:

----------------

M java/build/org/apache/derbyBuild/ReleaseNotesGenerator.java

Removed the requirement for documenting the release manager's Java 1.4 and Java 6 environments. The build machinery has changed sufficiently that this information is no longer needed.

----------------

M releaseSummary.xml

Added 10.10.1 feature summaries, filled in my machine's environment info, removed Java 1.4 from the list of supported JVMs.

----------------

M RELEASE-NOTES.html

The resulting release notes.

Attaching derby-6104-03-aa-releaseNotesTypos.diff. This patch fixes some typos in the release notes. Committed at subversion revision 1455509.

Touches the following files:

M releaseSummary.xml
M RELEASE-NOTES.html

Attaching derby-6104-04-aa-releaseNotesThirdRev.diff, a third draft of the release notes. This draft removes a redundant release note for DERBY-5996 and adds a release note for DERBY-5578. Committed at subversion revision 1456972.

Touches the following file:

M RELEASE-NOTES.html

Attaching derby-6104-05-aa-createBranchWithChangeNumber.diff. This patch makes the createBranch target lookup the current change number. For some reason it no longer knows the changenumber. Fixing this may require a couple submissions. Committed at subversion revision 1457735.

Touches the following file:

M build.xml

Attaching derby-6104-06-aa-bumpTrunkTo10.10.diff. This patch adds 10.10 to the list of Derby branches on our website. This patch also updates some stale information on the derby_source page. Committed to website source at subversion revision 1457780 and to website target at subversion revision 854953.

Touches the following files:

X build/site
M src/documentation/content/xdocs/dev/derby_source.xml

Performing status on external item at 'build/site'
M build/site/dev/derby_source.html

Attaching derby-6104-08-aa-releaseNotesFirstCandidate.diff. This patch checks in the version of the release notes which will be packaged in the first release candidate. Committed at subversion revision 1457786.

Touches the following file:

M RELEASE-NOTES.html

Attaching derby-6104-09-aa-cleanupAfterJiraSoap.diff. This patch makes the release notes generator remove the generated jirasoap machinery after the release notes are successfully built. This prevents the jirasoap cruft from turning up in source distributions. Committed at subversion revision 1457942.

Touches the following file:

M tools/release/build.xml
Ported 1457942 from trunk to 10.10 branch at subversion revision 1457945.

Attaching derby-6104-10-aa-scrubMore142References.diff. This patch removes some more references to J2SE 1.4.2 from the public api and the top level index.html of the release distributions. Committed at subversion revision 1458256.

Touches the following files:

M published_api_overview.html
M index.html
Ported 1458256 from trunk to 10.10 branch at subversion revision 1458262.

Attaching derby-6104-11-aa-releaseNotesSecondCandidate.diff. This patch adjusts the release notes, changing the release id from 10.10.1.0 to 10.10.1.1. Committed at subversion revision 1458265.

Touches the following file:

M RELEASE-NOTES.html

I have attempted to add the 10.10 docs to the website. At the very end of this long checkin, I received this subversion error:

svn: Commit failed (details follow):
svn: No such transaction '858668-ifqo'

When I tried to commit again, I received this error:

svn: Commit failed (details follow):
svn: Server sent unexpected return value (405 Method Not Allowed) in response to MKCOL request for '/repos/infra/!svn/wrk/90d61d29-058a-4d4d-be39-3dc240f81a05/websites/production/db/content/derby/docs/10.10'

I then "svn update"ed my website client. I received a diagnostic line for every html file, saying it was updated and it already existed:

EG 10.10/tools/rtoolsoptdbmetadata.html

...and I went through the following dialog on every binary file:

Conflict discovered in '10.10/tools/derbytools.pdf'.
Select: (p) postpone,
(mf) mine-full, (tf) theirs-full,
(s) show all options: mf

Now "svn status" shows that I have no files checked out in my client. I believe that the checkin succeeded. At least, I can see the Getting Started Guide at http://db.apache.org/derby/docs/10.10/getstart/index.html. But we should keep an eye out for problems with this checkin.

Checked in website changes for release 10.10.1.

Source revision 1468456
Generated files revision 858682
Attaching derby-6104-12-aa-doap.diff. This patch adds 10.10.1.1 to the list of versions on Derby's rdf descriptor. Committed at subversion revision 1468540.

Created 10.10.1.1 code tag at subversion revision 1468541: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/db/derby/code/tags/10.10.1.1/

Created 10.10.1.1 doc tag at subversion revision 1468542: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/db/derby/docs/tags/10.10.1.1/
Checked 10.10.1.1 jars into a 10.10.1.1 subdirectory of the jars directory used by the upgrade tests. Committed at subversion revision 1468547.

Attaching derby-6104-13-aa-upgradeStartingPoints.diff. This patch adds 10.10.1.1 to the table of starting points for the upgrade tests. Committed at subversion revision 1468554.

Touches the following file:

M java/testing/org/apache/derbyTesting/functionTests/tests/upgradeTests/OldVersions.java

Attaching derby-6104-14-aa-status.diff. This patch updates the STATUS file to reflect the release of 10.10.1.1. Committed at subversion revision 1468560.

Touches the following file:

M STATUS

Attaching derby-6104-15-aa-news.diff. This adds the 10.10.1.1 release announcement to the News section on the landing page of the Derby website.

Committed source at subversion revision 1469005.
Committed generated html at subversion revision 858850.

Touches the following files:

X build/site
M src/documentation/content/xdocs/index.xml

Performing status on external item at 'build/site'
M build/site/index.html
The 10.10.1.1 maven artifacts have appeared at http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/org/apache/derby/ They haven't turned up here yet: http://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.apache.derby
